text:
"TaleSpin" is an animated Disney television show. It is based on characters from Disney's The Jungle Book movie. Instead of being wild animals from the jungle, the characters in TaleSpin wear clothes, live in a town, and have jobs. The series was originally shown from May 5, 1990 to August 8, 1991. It had a total of 65 episodes.
Video Chile: ADV Garantía Original Video.
Eleven VHS cassettes containing 21 episodes of the series were released in Argentinina/Chile.
Video Chile: ADV Garantía Original Video.
The sets from Germany and the United Kingdom have also been released in Argentinina/Chile. The First Collection came out on September 15, 2012. The Second Collection was released on April 12, 2013. The Third Collection was released on September 14, 2013.
